## QualifierTypes.TerritoryQualifierType.toTerritoryConditionValue() method

Converts a string value to a territory condition value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static toTerritoryConditionValue(value: string, acceptLowercase?: boolean): Result<QualifierConditionValue>;
```

The value to convert.

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierConditionValue](./ts-res.qualifierconditionvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;
